youtubeVideoBookMaker.title: Privacy Policy
youtubeVideoBookMaker.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how the YouTube Video BookMaker extension collects, uses, and protects your information.
youtubeVideoBookMaker.dataCollected: We only store bookmarks and optional notes you create within the extension. No personal data (e.g., name, email) is collected or transmitted.

permissions.storage: Access to browser storage to save your bookmarks and notes locally.
permissions.activeTab: Read information about the active YouTube tab to capture timestamps.
permissions.tabs: Retrieve the URL of YouTube video tabs for bookmarking.
permissions.scripting: Inject scripts into YouTube pages to enable bookmarking functionality.

youtubeVideoBookMaker.thirdParty: This extension does not use any third-party analytics or tracking services.
youtubeVideoBookMaker.changes: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect improvements. Updated policies will be published here and through extension updates.
